summary: Experienced Entrepreneur with a demonstrated history of working in the professional training & coaching and direct selling industry. Skilled in Presenting, Teaching, Coaching, Sales and Conflict Resolution. Strong, results-driven entrepreneurial professional.

profile_positions.description:
After 22 months of pre-launch consulting, and assisting Zinzino in setting up and launching the South African market, Kirsten Pearse formally joined Zinzino as Sales Director of Africa to support Zinzino's African operations. 

2022 Saw significant growth in the SA market, with customer and partner numbers consistently increasing which had the same effect on Sales. Since launch the market has continued to flourish with many leaders developed in the local market.
profile_positions.title: Sales Director

profile_positions.description: Together with the fantastic Zinzino corporate team, Kirsten took the lead in preparing the South African market for launch. This involved the logistics supply chain, product registration, financial and legal compliance, and formulating and initiating the sales strategy in South Africa.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Sales Director

profile_positions.description:
Pearse Consulting is a bespoke consultancy that assists International Direct Selling companies with the setup of their businesses in South Africa, and continued expansion into Africa. Our team has more than 3 decades of experience in the Direct Selling space in Southern Africa, but has a unique international perspective having worked in this space with teams in more than 150 countries across the world. 

Africa is the sleeping giant of the Direct Selling industry, and we are intent on assisting international companies to awaken this giant sustainably and ethically.
profile_positions.title: Company Owner

profile_positions.description:
Pearse Inc is the parent company of multiple subsidiaries that function across various industries, namely:

BAMTA Distribution: A specialised, South African medical and nutritional distribution and logistics company that functions as a 3PL for South African Compounding Pharmacists and International Manufacturers looking for a solution to distribute their products from suppliers to end-users across South Africa.

Direct Selling Consulting Africa: A bespoke offering assisting International Direct Selling companies with the setup of their businesses in South Africa, and expanding in to Africa.

Pearse Inc itself is the Strategic Partner arm that assists a global sales and distribution team in sharpening their skills and mastering the fundamentals that are required to build a successful business partnered with a Brand Partner. We do this by providing the Leadership, Mentoring, Information and Support needed. Pearse Inc  is redefining how people can succeed in the Direct Selling industry.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
A brief synopsis on the SETA accredited training we developed and facilitated through Larsen International:
 
We provide a powerful tool for professionals and professional organisations. Our one or two day workshops are designed for the specific needs of your organization and its people. Our internationally acclaimed working formula is fun, dynamic, easy to work with, reliable & measurable.

The very core of INTEGRATED LEADERSHIP COMPETENCY MODELS identifies and ties "Personal Motives and Insight to Self-Management Competency" and leads to every other aspect of Leadership, Interactive, Business and Management Competencies. Herein, lies the secret to successful productivity and transformation.

We use a programme that each individual will identify with and apply in their work environments.

We aim to provide: business owners, doctors, engineers, managing directors, directors, accountants, sales executives, administrators, HR, production management, supervisors as well as any level of staff with the improved people skills that will truly transform their lives and abilities to interact successfully with people. This not only increases their abilities and effectiveness in the work place but will provide them with the skills to interact effectively in their personal lives too.
 
Improved skills will enable you to get more done in less time but improved People Skills will enable you to gain the willing co-operation of people multiplying your ability to get more done in less time.

Competencies linked to outcome:
Problem Solving ability, Critical thinking ability, Self Management, Organisation skills, Analytical ability, Communication skills, Listening skills, Observation skills and Interpersonal skills.
profile_positions.title: Partner and Training Facilitator
